entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
